{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Compex |model=MMZ531 |revision=V1.0 |est_release_date=11/30/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=access point, CPE |pwr_v=12-24 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=passive |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9531 |cpu1_cspeed=650 |fla1=16 |ram1=64 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9531 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |stock_os=Linux;;CompexWRT; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn }} {{TagLine|MMZ531 Indoor Access Point}} :[https://www.compex.com.sg/product/mmz531/ Product page]
MMZ531 - ''MiMo Zen 531 series of Indoor Access Point'' {{See also|Compex WPJ531}}
===Features=== *Category: Indoor Access Point *CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz *Single Band 2.4GHz WiFi, 802.11bgn compliant :Up to 26dBm output power, Data rates: 300Mbps :Built-in 4dBi @2.4GHz pyramidal omni smart antenna *802.3af PoE, Supported OpenWrt
===Specifications=== *Product Type: Indoor Access Point *Chipset: [[QCA]] QCA9531 WiSoC *Architecture: MIPS 24Kc *System Memory: 64MB *Flash Memory: 16MB *Wireless Standard: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz) :MIMO: 2Ã—2, Wireless Speed: 300Mbps :Output (Per Chain): 23dBm @2.4GHz *Interface: 2x Fast Ethernet Port (10/100) *LED Indicators: 7x LED, Reset Button: Yes *Power: DC Jack: 12-24V, PoE: Passive 24V :Power Consumption: 6.9W (Max) *Operating System: CompexWRT, OpenWrt *Dimension (W x D x H): 161.5 x 161.5 x 80 mm
